message: I'm being fair, but I'm also being realistic - I want the majority. Accept this and we can both walk away with something.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a good deal considering the inflation working against you.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give away the majority. This offer is more in line with the value of the money for both of us, considering the inflation.
The inflation is eating away at your potential gains, Alice. I'm offering you 450,000 - take it before it shrinks further!
